glosses: Latakia (a port city in western Syria)
synonym of Eskihisar (“a neighbourhood in Merkezefendi district”)

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish لاذقیه (lâzıkiyye, lazkiye), from Arabic اللَّاذِقِيَّة (al-lāḏiqiyya), from Ancient Greek Λαοδίκεια (Laodíkeia), from Λαοδίκη (Laodíkē) + -εια (-eia), the name of numerous Hellenistic cities, generally named after one of many women by the name of Λαοδίκη (Laodíkē).
